title: Balanced meal
text: It was nice to enjoy to sit and relax at Cafe Rousse. Their food was tasty and their service good. I enjoy the fish. It was tasty and moist. All their covid regulations are in place and it felt save .

title: Eat in nature
text: Love this place. It feels open and you are in nature. There is n place to held children parties that is seperated from the restaurant. Their food is divine, tasty and different. Earlier in the month we enjoyed a lunch. Today we had ladies morning. Good place to eat as family and nice place to have a small gathering. Unfortunately I enjoyed the morning so much that I forgot to take pictures of the food. Chicken pastry with salad, pancake with chocolate and berries sauce. Lovely.

title: Paintnight
text: We had to go for a paintnight at Doppio Zero in Clearwater. Decided to eat something before the class started. We ordered a , must say I enjoyed the pizza. Their service was very good. They even served us drinks and looked after us till paintnight was over.

title: Take a break from Cooking
text: The service was very good. The food was absolutely divine. Their presentation of the food also plays an important part. Just by looking at it, is "please eat and enjoy me". I also ordered the chocolate volcano - you need to order that. I was over the and will definitely order that again. A suggestion if you are two you can order a veggie and share it between two people. We also enjoy the fairy lights in Clearwater it made it really a nice,relaxing evening out. It is a little bit pricy. Our bill was R550 but the food, drinks and dessert was worth it.

title: Break-Away
text: I love the bush and enjoyed my stay. Just very hot and the fans worked overtime. Please just make sure that if you want to rest and not driving around, come prepared. They do not have a restaurant on the premises. The swimming pool area is a nice place to relax with a very nice view. I just think they must be stricter when it comes to enforcing the rules. People played loud music from their cars and the drinking at the swimming out of glasses also was a downer. Accidents can happen easily. Otherwise, I enjoyed my time there. If you have children there is a few activities they can take part in solo or with their parents.

title: Lunch
text: A restaurant with a vibe. All the names hanging from the ceiling and against the walls. Love it. The waitress was friendly and very professional. The restaurant is situated across Margate beach. The food was fabulous. We ordered a calamari starter. We ordered surf and turf and sole. We ordered lemon cheesecake and that was divine and end the meal off with a cappuccino and hot chocolate.

title: Holiday
text: The wimpy is a nice place to have a breakfast or lunch. While you enjoy your lunch you also have a wonderful view of the sea. The breakfast is affordable and well prepared. The fruit and ice cream was delicious. Fruit were tasty and sweet. Their service was professional and we enjoyed our time there.

title: Holiday
text:
We stayed for 2 nights in Athens. We arrived late at the Polis Grand Hotel. We just repack our bags and decided we need to buy another bag (do more shopping in Santorini and Mykonos). The one thing we misjudged is the fact that it get much later darker. So we think it's still early then it's nearly 2100. On our first night in Athens we ate at the rooftop restaurant in our hotel. The service was excellent and our waiter was very professional and efficient. That was a stunning experience with the most spectacular views. We tried to take pictures but it is just not the same. The well lit Parthenon on the Acropolis was a fabulous site to see. Also the point where they said you could see the nicest sunset from. Then we know that's why we decided to visit the Parthenon. We went with a guided city tour with the main attraction Acropolis hill with Parthenon. The museum was also included on this tour. just take note at the museum if you have a big bag or a backpack you were supposed to handed in for safekeeping you are not allowed to enter the museum with your backpack.

They would drop you at the hotel but we chose to walk in the Plaka district where all the shops were. Guys and this is really a place where you can walk around and shop and eat. One of the things you can remember is that there is certain shops that have a tax-free section. You must ask for for it because most of the time they don't tell you we only realised it when it was nearly at the end of our shopping. The one thing I was glad I had on was comfortable shoes you need comfortable shoes guys because my feet was aching. We decided to walk back to the hotel otherwise we going to miss too much. We found nice affordable suitcases close to Polis Grand hotel and we were very very glad. At the hotel I just flopped on the bed with my feet in the air. We decided after our nice experience at the rooftop restaurant we're going to end of our visit there as well. This time we didn't had a very nice experience our waitress took our order but when we received our food we realise she did not really understand. We ate in stages first me and then my friend. Except for this it was a very nice experience. The people working at the front desk was really efficient and professional and they will always assisting us and telling us what is the best option. Thanks guys we really appreciate it and we enjoyed our stay with you.

The last day we had a few hours to kill before our transfer to the airport back to South Africa. We went to the Hondos center that everybody was talking about and we had a real royal time there. Here you also can do tax free shopping. I think this is a much better option than to buy at the airport. Just keep your eyes on the clock if you only have a few hours to give.

title: Holiday
text: There is a lot of shops where you can buy souveneers. Bargain for prices and if you have your passport with you and buy more than 50 euros you can goods for tax free. It's not all the shops but is worthwhile asking. Enjoy and comfy shoes because you are going to walk. There is also restaurants and mini markets if you want to buy something to eat or drink.

title: Holiday
text: We went on a guided tour to the Acropolis there were a lot of people but they were well-organised and they was place and space for everybody. It is really nice to experience the Acropolis. Just make sure you wear comfortable shoes because it can be slippery rather walk slower and take your camera with.

title: Holiday
text: I would also suggest that you visit the museum as well. It's worthwhile seeing. Please just take note all big bags and backpacks need to be hand in for safekeeping before you enter the museum. There are toilet facilities and also a restaurant where you can buy souveneers. Nice experience.

title: Holiday
text:
Love the centre. Very big and you most probably get what you are looking for. We started on the bottom level and worked our way up to top floor. Where you can relaxed and get something to eat and drink. Have a beautiful view.

For international tourists. Please just mention you want your shopping tax free. They will give you the proof of what you bought and send it to the 5th floor. After all your shopping you just go to the 5th floor and you show proof of your passport and you will receive your shopping tax free.

title: Holiday in Greece
text: W wee really enjoyed our stay this staff is very friendly and professional. They're going the extra mile to make your stay as comfortable possible. They also gave us advice on which excursion will be the best for us. The rooms are nice and comfortable with a shower bath in the bathroom. The rooftop restaurant that's overlooking the Parthenon Acropolis is amazing to see at night. They also have room service but it's better to go and visit the rooftop restaurant and enjoy the experience.

title: Shopping
text: Shopping at Clearwater is fun. Different types of shops. Love the health shoes shop. Staff is friendly and professional. Jade and Velvet is a gem. Nice woman clothes.

title: Lunch
text: We had a lovely lunch at Metropolis at Palm Court in Roodepoort. The service was really. Kevin was an outstanding waiter. The food was well prepared. We ordered the chicken schnitzel with veggies and chops with mash and union rings.

title: Sunday lunch
text: Founders grill have a very nice ambience. The decor of a suit the place. The staff is friendly and the staff is friendly. The food is very nice and tasty. We had a started as well as the main meal. The prawns and the calamari was very nice and soft. The meat was tender and tasty. A little bit pricey but overall we enjoyed the experience.

title: Magaliespark Trip
text: We enjoyed our time at Magalies Park. They provide an entertaining program for the whole family, there are a lot of different activities to take part in. It is very nice to be so close to nature. They have a few swimming pools and the restaurants and menu is good and it priced very reasonable.

title: Holiday Brake Away
text:
We enjoyed our break away at The valleys park. The place is very clean and neat. The accommodation is very nice where we stayed. Two bedroom but can accommodate 6 people.
There is also two air cons one in the main bedroom and one in the living room. For the ladies, you don't have to take a hair dryer there is one in the main bedroom.

this is a audio place for people with families there is a lot of activities for children. There is also activities for the whole family and everybody can take part at the main swimming pool. The only negative thing that I can say is at the warm swimming pool there's is a funny smell.

The staff is very professional and friendly as well as the ground staff. Golf course in good condition. The menu really cater for all types of people, different varieties of food and the prices are reasonable.

It was nice taking stroll to the swimming pool and you really could relax and get exercise

title: Family Lunch
text: Cattleman's Kitchen is the place to go when you want to experience something different. The food was really reasonable priced. The service was very good and while we were eating a lady was playing a saxophone in the background it was very relaxing. The food was divine the meat was very soft and tasty. We ordered a buffet lunch a meat platter, chicken snitchel and a steak all of it was fabulous. We also look at the accommodation, they have 9 rooms. The rooms were very nicely decorated and invite you to stay over. The prices are also very reasonable comparing with other places. You can also order a picnic basket and enjoy a nice relaxing picnic under the trees. I I highly recommend Cattleman's Kitchen.

title: Eat on the run
text: We were hungry and decided to eat at Doppio Zero in Clearwater mall. The food was divine and service very good. The chicken strips were very moist and tender. Really love it. The waiter was also very good. Well done Doppio Zero Clearwater.

title: Lunch
text: I like the vibe of the place. Think when it is busy it would also be a nice place to be at. They have ample TVs for the sport fanatics. Their food is nice but according to me a little price. We ordered 6 chicken wings and chips and fish and chips with 2 milkshakes and the bill was R320 with a 20% discount, but we still enjoyed their food.

title: Getting together
text: We met friends at Pearlys Langebaan. It is located on the beach. We only enjoyed drinks and a pizza with our friends. The staff were friendly and they let you feel important. Love the view.

title: Holiday in the West Coast
text: We enjoyed our stay in Club Mykonos. The staff were professional when we booked in. The only thing that I would suggest is that they explain to you the different restaurants in the club Mykonos facility. We stayed in a one room sleep 4. At first we thought it will be a bunk bed. Big was our surprise 2 twin beds in the room (we asked for twin beds), and a double bed in the living are. I love it. The unit was clean and ready when we arrived. We made use of the security and tv services. They were also professional and friendly. Explained everything thing in detail. Well done. The facilities at Mykonos were well maintained. I also made use of their gym. The under roof swimming pool can be noisy especially when there is a lot of kids. The restaurants and supermarket was close to our unit. We enjoyed a nice fish dish at Bouzouki. Only the 2nd last day we realised there were other restaurants on the other side. We enjoyed our stay, we had nice weather and I enjoyed the pools and the sea. They also had a program running at the outdoor pool.

title: Sunday Lunch
text: We enjoyed a nice lunch at Rare steakhouse in Clearwater. The water with lemon were nice and refreshing. The service was excellent and the food was devine. The fish was well prepared, not dry at all. The butternut was also soft and tender.

title: Holiday
text: Natal Spa is a nice place to go to. The food of the restaurant is good. Prices differ depending on what you order. They also have a bistro where you can enjoy something to eat. They have different swimming pools. Only 2 of them are warm, I would love it if one of the big were pools also heated. The put put court is a little bit wierd, but we still enjoyed the game. A little bit expensive, think that if they made it cheaper it would attract more people. The unit we stayed in was nice and we enjoyed the time. We stayed in the self-catering houses. If you stay in self-catering units you need to take your food with, also your charcoal you are not allowed to use wood. The only things available to buy is milk and bread, chocolates. So go prepared if you want to make your own meals. The road to Paulpietersburg is not really the best. They also have a wellness center, with message salon, gym, hybrid pool (was under maintenance), steam room, sauna and jacuzzi. Please just ask at reception if you qualify for complementary tickets, otherwise it can be expensive. The scenery was fabulous and they have a short hiking trail. We relaxed and enjoyed our stay at Natal Spa.
place: Gooderson Natal Spa Hot Springs & Leisure Resort

title: Rare Restaurant
text: We decided to have dinner tonight atthe Rare Restaurant in Clearwater. The presentation of the food was done professionally. We both ordered fillet, the fillet was tender and soft. The veggies were also very tasty. Would definitely recommend this restaurant.

title: 2nd Cup
text: We were just in the mood for nature. Decided to go to second cup for lunch. If you love the outdoor you will enjoy it. Just take something to through over your shoulders if there is a little chill in the air you are prepared. We were sitting outside under the trees with the chickens scrubbing under the trees. The service was good and we all enjoyed our food. Worthwhile trying it out.

title: Diamonds and Pearls
text: Planned a get together for friends. We enjoyed the show. When I booked I also place a food order. Before we went to our seats we ordered our drinks. When we arrived at our seats, a tablecloth, glasses and plates were already been there. The service was good and the chicken strips basket were divine.

title: Visit
text: We went to walk around in Cullinan and decided to eat at OppieStasie. The restaurant was very cosy and the inside of the restaurant looked like a train inside. We were sitting on the platform. It was very relaxing and you have to be patient because it take a while to prepare the food. The prices were reasonable and we enjoyed the outing.

title: Rare Restaurant in Clearwater
text: The first time in a while I must say we enjoyed our dinner. The service of the restaurant was outstanding. The meat is more or less R30 more expensive than Spur if you want to compare prices. But it's every cent worth the way they prepare the food was divine. I can't remember when last did I enjoyed liver and mash. They will definitely send us again. Already planned to take our friends there.

title: Meeting
text: The venue was well prepared. Table and chairs with water and sweets, as well as notepad and pen. The staff of the hotel were very accommodating and the food was well prepared, there was a big choice to choose from.
place: Holiday Inn Johannesburg Sunnyside Park Hotel

title: Weekend
text: Klein Kariba is clean and neat place in the bushveld. They have different types of accommodation. We stayed in a flat. Sleep 5 adults easily. We experienced cold weather but still we enjoyed it. The 2 outside pools were warm and you could even swim in them if you did not mind the wind. There is also an indoor pool that was very clean and warm. Security was at all times around the pool areas. There is a small shop where you could buy the necessary products. They also have a restaurant but we prepared our own food. At the outside pool they also have places that sell lighter type of meals or I must say snacks. We enjoyed our stay there more or less 2 hours drive from Johannesburg. The staff we interact with was friendly and professional. This place is also nice for fisherman.

title: Lunch
text: We enjoyed a very nice meal. They had a spitbraai. Chicken, lamb and beef with salads. It's was devine. The owner did the spitbraai. The staff were professional and friendly. Worthwhile go and enjoy.

title: Sunday lunch
text: We had a nice experience at Porterhouse. The service was great and the people are friendly. The food was divine. I would suggest that you visit it. The fillet was made to my taste. Juicy and tender. My mom and brother enjoyed their food as well. The spinach was fabulous. They also run specials during the week.

title: Take Away
text: I visited Nando at Horizon View. When I arrived there realised that they moved to the opposite corner. Unfortunately I was in a hurry but would like to go back and enjoy a sit down meal. The layout and decorations were impressive. Everything is new. The chicken was tender and juicy. The chicken strips and rice ( lemon and herb) were filling and juicy but I still prefer the chicken strips and veggie option.

title: Weekend stayover
text: On arrival we were welcomed. The accommodation was ready for us and we could unpack. The facilities were up to standard and the swimming pools were clean. They have 2 pools outside, one cold and one hot. Also a hydro pool with sauna and steamroom facilities. The food at the restaurant was also nice and prices were reasonable.

title: Johannesburg Zoo
text: Today we visited the Johannesburg Zoo. I haven't be there for a long time. They are still busy improving and that is a good thing. I really enjoyed the visit to the zoo. At the entrance you will also find the people of Happy Snappy. As you entered they took your pics and when you return you can decide if you want to buy the pack or not. I would just advice you not to wear green because then you disappear in the background. Just make sure you take money with the photo pack cost you R220 but I think it is worthwhile. You are also able to access the photos online and can download it when you bought the pack. The pack is colourful the background are gorgeous. It was nice walking and looking at the different animals.We were there for 3 hours and we all enjoyed it.

title: Tenors in Concert
text: I loved every moment of the show. The acoustics were fabulous. The time flew it is a show worth seeing.

title: Accommodation
text: Nice and walking distance from the attractions and restaurants. We ordered room service but did not receive anything (maybe language barrier). They were very helpful and assist with giving advice about exchanging of money.

title: Bidon Bistro Muldersdrift
text: It was my first visit to Bidon Bistro. We enjoyed a very nice breakfast. You sit outside and the scenery is beautiful. You just need something warm if you getting cold easily. Very relaxing atmosphere and friendly staff. Very busy over weekends. Heaven for people that do cycling.

title: Swimming
text: Its a nice open beach to swim in and relatively save. I did not see any lifeguards on duty. There was temporary tiolet facilities on the beachThey are also busy revamping the walkway.

title: Overnight between Johannesburg and Cape Town
text: Very nice place to stay over. We stopped at 2300 looking for accommodation in Hanover. The garage attendant advice us to the hotel or Bun Cody. When we asked which one of the two he suggested Bun Cody. We stopped in front of Bun Cody and phone to find out if they had space. Luckily they did, we just had to wait they were just getting ready for bed. Danie and Tossie invited us in and show us to our room. This morning we had a nice breakfast. We asked if we can look at the house. Very interesting history. I would suggest this place its also very reasonable. Thanks to Danie and Tossie for their hospitality.

title: .Clearwater Mall
text: I love to visit Clearwater. Close to my home and worthwhile visiting. I usually find what I am looking for. It depend what you are going to do, movies or eat at the restaurants - this will determine the time you spend here.

title: Cafe Rousse
text: Their food are divine. I also love their unique juice lemon, ginger combination. I can also recommend the chicken schnitzel.

title: Day Tour
text: We enjoyed the excursion to Hagia Sophia. The tourguide gave us interesting facts about Hagia Sophia. Will defnitely suggest that you make use of a tour guide to really understand the history of Hshis Sophia.

title: Day Tour
text: We enjoyed our experience here and it is worthwhile seeing but make use of a tour guide. The tour guide will be able to tell you much more of the Blue Mosque ande history.

title: Cappadocia tour with Underground City Tour
text: We had a lovely enjoyable experience of Cappadocia. We met very nice people on our trip and enjoyed every second of it. Our tour guide Cemil was really a star and planned surprises for us along the road. He was also concerned about all of our safety due to the snow. We had lovely experiences and felt very safe in the hands of our capable drivers. Thanks to all for this experience.

title: Aslan Restaurant and Hiking trip
text: After a nice hiking trip in the snow we went to eat at the Aslan Restaurant. Nice experience. Thanks to Cemil you made it enjoyable for us.

title: Holiday in Cappadocia
text: The hotel is fabulous with a stunning view. We stayed in the purple room and we felt like queens. Me and my friend enjoyed every moment of it. Language is a big barrier because they cannot speak English but with signs and smiles and thumbs up it worked.

title: Day trip Cappadocia tour with Göreme and Uçhisar
text: We enjoyed our trip. They picked us up at the hotel and took us to the meeting point. We met our tourguide Cemil. He spoke english and he shared with us his knowledge. He made the trip very interesting and ee enjoyed him. Hope we are with him for our next trip as well. Thanks for making our day Cemil.

title: Hamam experience
text: We did not really know what to exspect. Language was a barrier we just point and said that is what we want to do. Unfortunately we did not have enough money for the oil message that would round off the experience. We enjoyed it because it was the first time we have done something like this.

title: Lunch
text: Good variety of food to choose from buffet. Cold or hot can ne chosen. The desserts are devine. Good place to eat if you want traditional Turkish fare.
